column18: 02/24/2009: On Tuesday, in Tatarszentgyorgy, Hungary, Robert Csorba and his five-year-old son were shot and killed while they were trying to escape their house, which had been set on fire. It has not been known if the attack was racially motivated. No group claimed responsibility.
column39: Robert Csorba and his five-year-old son.
column64: The specific motive for the attack is unknown.
column97: Unknown weapons were used in the attack.
column108: The attack caused an unknown amount of property damage.
